title: Leaf and the Tree tree no mightier than leaf

content.question: The paradoxical assertion that the tree is “no mightier than the leaf” (line 18) suggests that the tree

choices.label: is made up of the same elements as the leaf is
grows in the same fashion as the leaf
will meet the same fate as the leaf
is not in direct competition with the leaf

content.answer: will meet the same fate as the leaf

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
